rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance and circulation space.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Open plan area adjacent to dining space, designed with natural light in mind.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: Connected to the living room and kitchen via open circulation.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, ample storage and ventilation.

rooms.name: central_courtyard
rooms.description: Open green space at the center of the floor plan to promote natural ventilation and light.

rooms.name: guest_bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom for guests with water-saving fixtures.

rooms.name: bedroom_1
rooms.description: Master bedroom with private balcony, overlooking the central courtyard.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a large balcony for relaxation and fresh air, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with private balcony facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: bedroom_4
rooms.description: Functional bedroom that provides privacy and ample space, including a balcony.

rooms.name: private_gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped, eco-friendly gym with sustainable materials and energy-efficient lighting.

rooms.name: storage_area
rooms.description: Utility storage for gardening tools and seasonal items.

rooms.name: study_room
rooms.description: Cozy study area with access to natural light and ventilation from a partially open ceiling.
